location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Government Advertisement from John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay Castle

physicalDescription.extent: The printed advertisement is original, glued to the correspondence book.

mods.abstract: Government Advertisement signed by John Kaye, Auditor of Civil Accounts at Bombay Castle, requesting annual statements of expenditure to be delivered to the Office of Audit by 31 May 1814.
